list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He is the creator of a successful TV detective series.

list_ex_of_english: I argued above that very many puzzles and difficulties confront the view that the creator is unsurpassable whilst creation is not.
Suppose the best world a given omnipotent and omniscient creator could actualize contains creatures who endure incredible amounts of pain.
A major question is whether local societies in tropical regions should be considered as agents of deforestation or as creators of dynamic forested landscapes.
Why, we may ask, did the creators go to so much trouble to make a single continuum?
Such a world, after all, would lack humans, thinkers, creators, lovers, and animals.
I say we should all be grateful to the creators of clear and falsifiable analyses, even when they are not perfect.
He formulated the project of composing some; he dared to be a creator.
It might be suggested that a creator in such a situation has an obligation toward those creatures not to actualize the world in question.
